originalText.text:
Fitzgerald was very helpful for the notary. He has cleaned this local UWS location up. 90s style clean with plenty of atms. Aka no vagrants!
Bank is open 9 am to 5 pm. Steps from Uws 86th uptown 1 train.

originalText.text: What a difference a day makes. Thank you for the response to my earlier review.  I went back to do what I could not do yesterday and Jennifer was pleasant and efficient. I appreciate her great assistance so much. THANK YOU CITI BANK.  ❤️96th St Branch.

text.text: What a difference a day makes. Thank you for the response to my earlier review.  I went back to do what I could not do yesterday and Jennifer was pleasant and efficient. I appreciate her great assistance so much. THANK YOU CITI BANK.  ❤️96th St Branch.

originalText.text: My Citi bank card its damaged and the chip or the parts where we swipe is not working at all. Today 12/02/22 when to take some cash out and the way the staffs looked at me was uncomfortable. I feel like i was doing something wrong when the only thing i need  was my moneys to paid my bills. I currently  a General Manager from a Restaurant around the area and they way the guy call “Manager “ handle the situation was not the right one”. Also this bank dont use the Tap option them why have it on the card if we cant use it. Stop making people feel like they are criminal and are doing bad things .All I need was my money, the money that i earned working hard. You guy should learns about Hospitality, look it up and teach your self about it.

originalText.text:
I made a deposit at the ATM. The ATM had a technical issue and the amount was not reflected in my account. I got a receipt saying the money couldn´t be returned because of a technical issue and that´s it!
I asked for assistance in the office and they were unable to do nothing to assist me. They called to the same number I have in my card. That was all the help I got. I week later I´m still waiting for a call an email or a credit back in my account while the open investigation proves I did the deposit.
The service in this office is just terrible. They are unable to help and solve any single issue.

originalText.text:
Citibank let’s you know you’re overdrafted after they’ve charged the fee.
Four separate ‘customer service’ reps also told me that they’d fixed a fraud alert problem to restore access to my account. None of them actually had and I was stuck without access for two days.
Never again. Switched to Chase.
